I have plans to be more reproducible and open sciency. In the coming years, my code will be published as R packages where it may be useful to others.

Currently, I have two minor packages out:
\
\

{{< iconify ph:list-bullets-thin title='publistR' width=30px >}}
<a href="https://github.com/zheer-kejlberg/publistR">{publistR}</a>:   
an R package to easily create a structured and formatted list of your publications (example <a href="https://zheer.dk/cv/publications.html">here</a>)
\
\

{{< iconify ph:table-thin title='Z.gtsummary.addons' width=30px >}}
<a href="https://github.com/zheer-kejlberg/Z.gtsummary.addons">{Z.gtsummary.addons}</a>:  
a couple of functions to add to the great <a href="https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/">{gtsummary}</a> package.
